20101224024308.000|20101224024310.000|CC1|           Great news!          
20101224024310.000|20101224024310.000|CC1|      For people with COPD,     
20101224024310.000|20101224024313.000|CC1|  including chronic bronchitis, 
20101224024313.000|20101224024314.000|CC1|       emphysema, or both,      
20101224024314.000|20101224024314.000|CC1|   ADVAIR helps significantly   
20101224024314.000|20101224024317.000|CC1|     improve lung function.     
20101224024317.000|20101224024319.000|CC1| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101224024319.000|20101224024319.000|CC1|  ADVAIR is different from most 
20101224024319.000|20101224024322.000|CC1|     other COPD medications     
20101224024322.000|20101224024322.000|CC1|       because it contains      
20101224024322.000|20101224024324.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20101224024324.000|20101224024324.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20101224024324.000|20101224024326.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20101224024326.000|20101224024326.000|CC1|        working together        
20101224024326.000|20101224024328.000|CC1|   to help you breathe better.  
20101224024328.000|20101224024328.000|CC1|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101224024328.000|20101224024332.000|CC1|  inhalers for sudden symptoms  
20101224024332.000|20101224024332.000|CC1|        and should not be       
20101224024332.000|20101224024333.000|CC1|   used more than twice a day.  
20101224024333.000|20101224024336.000|CC1| People with COPD taking ADVAIR 
20101224024336.000|20101224024336.000|CC1|    may have a higher chance    
20101224024336.000|20101224024337.000|CC1|          of pneumonia.         
20101224024337.000|20101224024337.000|CC1|       ADVAIR may increase      
20101224024337.000|20101224024340.000|CC1|    your risk of osteoporosis   
20101224024340.000|20101224024341.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20101224024341.000|20101224024341.000|CC1|        Tell your doctor
